changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE START.usuario ( id uuid DEFAULT RANDOM_UUID() NOT NULL, codigo INT GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY NOT NULL, ativo bool DEFAULT true NOT NULL, data_registro timestamp DEFAULT now() NOT NULL, id_perfil uuid NULL, login varchar(50) NOT NULL, nome varchar(100) NOT NULL, cpf varchar(11) NOT NULL, senha varchar(60) NOT NULL, email varchar(50) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT tb_usuario_codigo_key UNIQUE (codigo), CONSTRAINT tb_usuario_cpf_key UNIQUE (cpf), CONSTRAINT tb_usuario_email_key UNIQUE (email), CONSTRAINT tb_usuario_login_key UNIQUE (login), CONSTRAINT tb_usuario_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id) );
